name: Furry Animals Bombing
description:
Furry Animals Bombing is an interesting arcade strongly resembling famous Angry bird, but instead of birds we will have here moss lumps, and the pigs will be replaced by funny aliens who decided to take over the planet. Protect your homeland with all your strength and don't let the enemy break through. Run furry friends with slingshots on fortified positions of aliens, and destroy their positions, while destroying the aliens themselves. At your disposal there is a whole arsenal of weapons
against them, use it correctly and you will definitely win! There are more than 60 levels and 4 different worlds in the game.

Features:
  • HD graphics
  • Completely free game
  • Great music.
  • 60 different levels.
  • Destroyable environment
  • A large number of dynamic objects
  • Excellent physics
  • 4 types of locations, and the main thing is a large number of destructible objects.
